channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JW50MMCNWV6NZAHXHP0E8CS5
item.description: My Evos / Walehost VPS was down for 9 hours yesterday. Thing is, the provider seems unresponsive on their Discord support channel.
item.content:encoded: My Evos / Walehost VPS was down for 9 hours yesterday. Thing is, the provider seems unresponsive on their Discord support channel.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JV3QW05FEE8SNXBSTFJT9WWS
item.description: Is it just me, or does anyone else find @silverbulletmd slow and clunky when navigating or taking notes? I initially thought it was just my machine, but I experienced the same thing on the demo site. It’s a shame—it could’ve been a great note-taking app with its powerful query features.
item.content:encoded: Is it just me, or does anyone else find @silverbulletmd slow and clunky when navigating or taking notes? I initially thought it was just my machine, but I experienced the same thing on the demo site. It’s a shame—it could’ve been a great note-taking app with its powerful query features.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JTNQVR5MQJR7PFB32C8GVKV5
item.description:
Why I still choose Android over iPhone in 2025

  • Cheaper esp. I’m fine with the Samsung and S FE series
  • SMS spam folder not available in iPhone
  • Interface
  • Native back button or back gesture
item.content:encoded:
Why I still choose Android over iPhone in 2025

  • Cheaper esp. I’m fine with the Samsung and S FE series
  • SMS spam folder not available in iPhone
  • Interface
  • Native back button or back gesture

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JSG45EKC6A4GPYQ9X7SY004Y
item.description: ​As of April 2025, the Los Angeles Lakers and the Los Angeles Clippers have never faced each other in the NBA playoffs. Despite sharing the same city and, until recently, the same arena, their postseason paths have never intersected. The Clippers have made 19 playoff appearances in their 55-season history , while the Lakers have qualified for the playoffs 65 times in 77 seasons . However, they have never met in a playoff series.
item.content:encoded: ​As of April 2025, the Los Angeles Lakers and the Los Angeles Clippers have never faced each other in the NBA playoffs. Despite sharing the same city and, until recently, the same arena, their postseason paths have never intersected. The Clippers have made 19 playoff appearances in their 55-season history , while the Lakers have qualified for the playoffs 65 times in 77 seasons . However, they have never met in a playoff series.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JQHBMD2XBP7GV6ME804QASWY
item.description: I really tried to like #NocoDB, but the more I tried the more I found reasons to go back to #Airtable. It’s just missing too many features to be a real alternative for me.
item.content:encoded: I really tried to like #NocoDB, but the more I tried the more I found reasons to go back to #Airtable. It’s just missing too many features to be a real alternative for me.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JQE55XAYB5985S1ZR0C26J53
item.description: To suppress the #delegation warning in #PowerApps while using #Sharepoint as the datasource, here’s the formula that worked when using the Search function: gist.github.com/∞
item.content:encoded: To suppress the #delegation warning in #PowerApps while using #Sharepoint as the datasource, here’s the formula that worked when using the Search function: gist.github.com/∞

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JQ9BJ2G9CKNA39AGVGRQFKX8
item.description: The use of Name and Folder path columns to filter a #Sharepoint Document Library is not delegable in #PowerApps. I don’t think they can even be compared to Sharepoint Lists because these metadata don’t exist in the latter: deuts.org/∞
item.content:encoded: The use of Name and Folder path columns to filter a #Sharepoint Document Library is not delegable in #PowerApps. I don’t think they can even be compared to Sharepoint Lists because these metadata don’t exist in the latter: deuts.org/∞

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JQ83T8BMF1E979SV9SMDJK8Q
item.description: Yo! #TheLastOfUs Season 2 is almost here. Season 2 premieres April 13. Can’t wait!
item.content:encoded: Yo! #TheLastOfUs Season 2 is almost here. Season 2 premieres April 13. Can’t wait!
